service.title: I. Service Definition
service.platform: BizyAir platform (hereinafter referred to as 'platform') authorizes users to use platform functions including but not limited to BizyAir node services and task execution by providing 'BZ Coins' virtual products.
service.types: BZ Coins are divided into two categories:
service.gold: Gold Coins: BZ coins directly purchased by users through recharge, with validity period and limited refund rights;
service.silver: Silver Coins: BZ coins given by the platform through activities, membership benefits, etc., with validity period and non-refundable or withdrawable.

acquisition.title: 1. Acquisition and Usage
acquisition.methods: Users can purchase gold coins through recharge, or obtain silver coins through platform activities, membership, etc.
acquisition.usage: BZ coins can only be used for designated platform services (such as node resource consumption, task execution, etc.), and cannot be transferred, traded or exchanged for cash.

gold.rule: Can apply for refund based on remaining ratio within 180 days after recharge (handling fee required)

nodeTypes.title: 3.1 Node Classification Billing
nodeTypes.desc: The platform implements differentiated billing strategies for various nodes, specifically divided into two categories:
nodeTypes.goldOnly: Gold Coin Only Nodes: Only accept gold coin payments (node details page will clearly state 'Gold Coins Only');
nodeTypes.mixed: Mixed Payment Nodes: Support both gold and silver coin payments (default deduction follows the 'Silver Coins First' principle).

execution.title: 3.2 Billing Execution Rules
execution.rule1: For mixed payment nodes, the system prioritizes deducting silver coins, automatically deducting gold coins when silver coin balance is insufficient;
execution.rule2: For gold coin only nodes, only gold coin balance is deducted;
execution.rule3: If the corresponding coin balance is insufficient, the system will immediately suspend the node service and push a balance warning notification.

special.title: 3.3 Special Notes
special.desc: Node types and billing methods may change due to operational adjustments. Actual billing rules are subject to the node details page at the time of service use.

recharge.title: Recharge Confirmation
recharge.content: After successful recharge, users can check BZ coin balance and validity period in their account.

refund.title: Refund Application
refund.content: Gold coin refunds must be applied through platform customer service, refund amount calculated based on remaining validity period ratio (handling fee details as announced on platform).

restriction.title: Usage Restrictions
restriction.content: Obtaining BZ coins through unofficial channels or exploiting system vulnerabilities for profit is prohibited. Violators' accounts may be frozen and held accountable.

service.title: Service Adjustments
service.content: The platform reserves the right to adjust BZ coin rules, pricing, or service content due to operational or policy reasons, with notification via announcements/in-site messages.

abnormal.title: Abnormal Handling
abnormal.content: If account abnormalities are detected (such as malicious coin farming), the platform may suspend services and recover illegal gains.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The platform is not liable for losses caused by force majeure or user violations.

userBehavior.title: V. User Behavior Standards and Breach Liability

prohibited.title: 1. Prohibited Conduct
prohibited.desc: Users must strictly comply with the following conduct guidelines when using BizyAir platform services:
prohibited.item1: Strictly prohibited to modify platform service content, service period, transaction amount, or consumption records through any technical means.
prohibited.item2: Prohibited to provide account or service privileges to third parties through any platform-unauthorized means (including but not limited to lending, renting, selling, sharing, etc.).
prohibited.item3: Strictly prohibited to crack, tamper with, reverse engineer, or perform other destructive operations on the platform's security protection system.
prohibited.item4: Without platform written authorization, service content may not be displayed or distributed in any public venue (online or offline) (except for fair use cases).
prohibited.item5: Must not engage in any behavior that violates laws, regulations, this agreement, or infringes upon the legitimate rights of the platform and third parties.

breach.title: 2. Breach Handling Measures
breach.desc: If users violate this agreement or relevant laws and regulations, BizyAir platform has the right to take the following measures based on severity:
breach.item1: Handle according to special provisions in this agreement.
breach.item2: Take necessary technical measures to stop violations, including but not limited to deleting violating content, restricting account functions, or suspending service access.
breach.item3: Unilaterally terminate part or all services, with paid fees non-refundable and users having no right to claim any form of compensation.

agreement.title: Agreement Changes
agreement.content: Continued use of services after agreement revision is deemed acceptance of new terms.

dispute.title: Dispute Resolution
dispute.content: Disputes should be resolved through negotiation; if unsuccessful, submit to the court where the platform is located.

refund.title: Refund Example
refund.content: If a user recharges 100 gold coins and uses 30% before requesting a refund, within 180 days of order effectiveness, they can receive the amount corresponding to the remaining 70 gold coins (minus handling fee); beyond 180 days, no refund is available.

goldExpire.title: Gold Coin Expiration
goldExpire.content: Unused gold coins will automatically expire and cannot be recovered after the validity period.

silverExpire.title: Silver Coin Expiration
silverExpire.content: Unused silver coins will automatically expire and cannot be recovered after the validity period.

resumableUpload.title: Resumable Upload
resumableUpload.largeFileWarning: File is large, upload may take longer
resumableUpload.unstableNetworkWarning: Network is unstable, upload speed may be affected
resumableUpload.uploadTimedOut: Upload timed out, please check your network connection
